text: I have learned how to use `CUDA.@profile` to profile julia runs on GPUs and like that it gives the timings of the most used functions.  I would like to do something similar but on CPUs.  I kow there is a function `Profile.@profile` tht looks similar but the output is much longer and I don't see where it gives the timings for the most used functions.  Is there another profiler that will give similar information so I can compare the two results more easily?
